scripts.say: *Phew*... Looks like it's finally started to cool down a little bit tonight... It's way too humid and hot here, and the sun is oppressive as well. If not for this mission, I would have booked it long ago.
I sure envy Astoria. Her class consists of only sisters, but over here, we have "allies," not just sisters. Well, it's not like I have anything against them...
*Sigh*... Houston, how nice it'd be if you were here...
Gah, this is no time to be getting sentimental. Australia went north to meet up with the others, so I am now temporarily in charge of the South Group. I have to set a good example, hehe.
I just have to hang in there a bit longer. Tomorrow...
(Chicago's thoughts were suddenly interrupted by the blaring of sirens.)
This is... an alert from Patterson?
Impossible...! How could the Sakura Fleet show up here? Also, what's with this distance?! Savo Island's patrols should have picked them up on their radars...!
(Suppressing her shock, she quickly went to message Bagley.)
Bagley, please come with me! We've got trouble!
(In the distance, the horizon glowed with the embers of battle, as if a gaping maw had opened up in the night.)
